column4: right so im not sure whats going on... I'm new to linux and ubuntu but i want it to work

check it for defects, if its fine and still doesnt work try the alternate install cd

text based installer, go back to the download page and look for the check box
I downloaded the alternative cd and it started to install ubuntu, I want to test a live version first
